resources.string: There was a network error. You may have limited access to the TheTVDB.com from your connection right now. Try again later.
Ответ от TheTVDB не распознан. Пожалуйста, попробуйте еще раз позже.
There is no active connection to the internet reported. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and try again.

Welcome to SeriesGuide

Looks like you have no shows added, yet. Click Add Show in the menu to add some.

Or if you want to restore a backup, open Settings in the menu and look for Backup/Restore.
Обновление успешно. К сожалению некоторые изображения не скачать. Попробуйте еще раз позже.
Идет процесс обновления. Дождитесь его завершения, а затем повторите попытку.
Не удалось обновить. Нет внешнего накопителя или SD-карты.
Вы действительно хотите удалить это шоу?

Try to update this show to display more information (in the overview, long-press on it, select Update). If this doesn\'t help, there is likely no additional information in TheTVDB. Go to their site (www.thetvdb.com) to learn how to add some.
Ссылка IMDB не доступна. Обновите это шоу или перейти к thetvdb.com и добавьте его.
Ooops, there are no seasons for this show. Try updating the show (in the overview, long-press on it, select Update).
Ooops, there are no episodes for this season. Try updating the show (in the overview, long-press on it, select Update).
Ничего не удалось найти. Попробуйте целыми словами.
Could not reach TheTVDB. Please check your network connection or try again later.
will appear in your show list shortly.
already exists. It was updated instead.
Sort the show list alphabetically or by unwatched episode
В каком хронологическом порядке сортировать сезоны
Local content not available for every show/episode, update your shows after changing this
Hide SeriesGuide images from your photo gallery (reboot required)

http://battlelancer.com/seriesguide - developed by Uwe Trottmann.

Thanks to

 - the Oxygen Icon Theme Team for the Application Icon (GPL, http://www.oxygen-icons.org),

 - Matthew Altman for creating javatvdbapi (http://code.google.com/p/javatvdbapi),

 - Charlie Collins for his Android examples (http://code.google.com/p/and-examples),

 - Matthias Käppler for Droid-Fu (http://github.com/kaeppler/droid-fu),

 - Webdesigner Depot for the Primo Icon Set (http://www.webdesignerdepot.com) for the video icon

 - www.androidicons.com and

 - Chris for testing the thing out. Also thanks to the many tutorial writers out there! 

Translators on Crowdin:
- Corwin (Polish)
- ramiselin (Finnish)
- hyper (Russian)
- schwarzmx (Spanish)
- sheeper (Turkish)
- Zyntax (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish)
Go there to edit shows and episodes
Показать последние изменения, внесенные в SeriesGuide
Резервного копирования или восстановления ваших шоу
Remove all images from cache and SD card, updating shows will redownload them
Tracks the usage of SeriesGuide features to help improve SeriesGuide

Backup will store a copy of the SeriesGuide database in the folder \"seriesguidebackup\" on your SD card. If you reinstall SeriesGuide or install SeriesGuide on another Android device, just put this folder on the devices SD card. Hit Restore below and all your shows will be there again! (You can not import databases from newer versions into an older version, except it uses the same database version. See About in Settings.)
Резервное копирование не возможно. Нет никакого внешнего хранилища, на пример SD карты.
Восстановление из резервной копии не возможно. Нет никакого внешнего хранилища, на пример SD карты.
There is no backup file (\"/sdcard/seriesguidebackup/seriesdatabase\"). Can\'t restore database.
Backup file is not readable (\"/sdcard/seriesguidebackup/seriesdatabase\"). Can\'t restore database.
Убедитесь, что резервная копия находится на SD-карте. Все текущие шоу будут перезаписаны.
Look\'s like there are no episodes. Maybe try updating your shows.
Switch between 1x01 or S01E01 as number format
Sorry, there is not enough information to create a calendar event.
Display dates and times in your time zone instead of Pacific (US)
Offset times by a certain amount of hours

You may not do any harm with this app (overload servers, reverse engineer, ...).

This app collects certain information while you use it, including via Google Analytics. You can opt out of Google Analytics in Settings.

I am not responsible for breaking your device or anything bad that happens while you use it.

The source code is available for everyone on Google Code.
Set your trakt.tv credentials to integrate with trakt.tv
Mark as seen in Overview is shared with trakt.tv
